sectione.title: Professional AC Services at Your Doorstep
sectione.sub_title: Expert AC Care for Every Home
sectione.text: From installation to repair, gas refill to annual maintenance - UX Serve provides comprehensive air conditioning services across Chennai. Our certified technicians ensure your comfort all year round.

sectionTwo.title: Trusted by Chennai Residents
sectionTwo.text: UX Serve has been serving the Chennai community with reliable and affordable AC services. Our skilled technicians are trained to handle all major AC brands and provide quick, efficient service.

goal_to_achieve.title: Our Promise
goal_to_achieve.text: We are committed to providing the best AC service experience in Chennai with transparent pricing and professional service.
checklist: Transparent pricing with no hidden charges

sectionFour.title: Our Expert Team
sectionFour.text: Meet the skilled professionals who keep Chennai cool. Our technicians are factory-trained and certified for all major AC brands.

sectionSix.title: Stay Cool with UX Serve
sectionSix.text: Subscribe for exclusive AC maintenance tips, seasonal offers, and service reminders
